import React from 'react'; import '../Headers.css'; import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search" import ShoppingBasketIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import { useStateValue } from '../StateProvider'; import { auth } from '../firebase'; const Header = () => { const [{basket}, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const handleUser = () => { if(user){ auth.signOut(); } } return (
Hello Guest Sign In
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
); } export default Header;
